text:
Passing by and stopped for a photo and the cool breeze. Seletar fishing village is also nearby.

Maintenance going on so the path has become narrower on one side. So do look out for cyclists if you hanging around there.
You can see people fishing and some people heading down when it is low tide. Be aware when announcement is made to warn you about the potential rise of water

🐬Yishun Dam was constructed to harvest the water at Sungei Seletar for consumption.
🦤Yishun Dam is a scenic location where you can catch the view the Lower Seletar Reservoir on one side and Sungei Seletar and Seletar Fishing Village and Jetties on the other side.
🐋Standing at Yishun Dam would let you catch a glimpse of the Fishing village and jetties, famously known as the Last Fishing Village of Singapore.
🌊Sunrise and Sunset are best time to be around.
🌅Come and experience a moment of glory (pun intended) at this scenic and picturesque location.
Good place to relax and watch the sunset. Nothing special to see but the beauty of the nature❤️

Sunrise at Yishun Dam is a beautiful sight. 🌅 The sky turns golden, and the water reflects the light. It's peaceful and perfect for photos or relaxing. Easy to reach, it's a great spot to start your day.
